Text:
thx man ... 

now if only i could find subtitles... :/

A:9
V:9

Misspantha, thank you for the subtitles, but they seem to be of bad quality.

I quote: "These subtitles have been machine-translated. It's better than nothing, but some of the subtitles don't make sense. If the uploader is reading this, do you have the original French subtitles? I can try to translate them properly if you do."

So, it appears we're still lacking proper English subtitles for this movie.
Nope no subs. And the only existing subtitles are not very good. As is my french.
You could try this one but not sure how well it syncs with this download: http://www.podnapisis.net/en/ppodnapisi/search?tbsl=1&asdp=0&sk=I+killed+my+mother&sM=0&sJ=2&sY=&sAKA=1
The subs I linked above do not sync with this file so am adjusting them and will, hopefully, upload them soon.
@vainshane: Thank you very much for the link! The subs are in sync and the translation seems accurate. : )

Been waiting for this one for a long time. Mostly because of the subtitles which can be found here:
